segments.text: I observe the little girl standing there, her arm raised in hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her innocence is charming as she looks up at her brother, waiting for the cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's something sweet about their cooperation, despite the risky situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their adventurous spirits, even if it's a bit reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How adorable they are, sharing this secret moment together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then the puddle catches my eye again, and my smile fades a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if the boy doesn't succeed?
segments.speaker: PAR
